message.body: Thought you would find this amusing - I followed a PRIUS this morning w/ the personalized plate: "1HRDMAN". I'm guessing this means "1 hard man" which I found hysterically ironic. Made my morning!
Ha! We need to have drinks soon. It's my fault, I haven't been able to hang out with anyone lately. Can we look ahead to March and try to get something on the books?
Sure! But if we are looking that far ahead, want to try for dinner too? Say Doma or Figs or Blue Cat?
Absolutely. I haven't been to Figs in ages if you want to try that

Me neither! And I always loved that place. Let me know what dates work best. Unfortunately weekends are kind I bad for me but I think I will be in town the first or second wknd of March. I have to check the dates tho. Any week day should be fine.
Weekdays with for me except Mondays, usually. March 4?
